BardCantrips.Name: Blade Ward
BardCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

BardCantrips.Name: Dancing Lights
BardCantrips.Components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm)
BardCantrips.Description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration...

BardCantrips.Name: Friends
BardCantrips.Components: S, M (a small amount of makeup applied to the face as this spell is cast)
BardCantrips.Description: For the duration, you have advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one creature of your choice that isn't hostile toward you...

BardCantrips.Name: Light
BardCantrips.Components: V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
BardCantrips.Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius...

BardCantrips.Name: Mage Hand
BardCantrips.Description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range...

BardCantrips.Name: Mending
BardCantrips.Description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch...

BardCantrips.Name: Message
BardCantrips.Components: V, S, M (a short piece of copper wire)
BardCantrips.Description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message...

BardCantrips.Name: Minor Illusion
BardCantrips.Description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range...

BardCantrips.Name: Prestidigitation
BardCantrips.Description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice...

BardCantrips.Name: Thunderclap
BardCantrips.Description: You create a burst of thunderous sound, which can be heard 100 feet away...

BardCantrips.Name: True Strike
BardCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target’s defenses...

BardCantrips.Name: Vicious Mockery
BardCantrips.Description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range...
